resources.string: Oranges are tropical fruits that are actually some of the worlds most popular. There are different types of oranges, ranging from sweet to bitter. Each type belongs to the citrus family of fruits and grows on trees. Oranges are tropical fruits that are actually some of the worlds most popular.
